reviews.review: Un jeu puzzle super sympas avec un sénario futuriste plutot acrochant. Je le recomande pour les joueurs qui veulent joué tranquilement et qui aime les puzzles
amazing game play it no DO IT JUST DO IT now

Si te gusta tener que pensar para resolver puzles inteligentes, explorar mundos, y que una historia te lleve de la mano mientras su atmósfera te envuelve sin el menor esfuerzo... vas a disfrutar Portal 2. Por si fuera poco, probablemente te arranque más de una sonrisa divertida, como hizo conmigo.

Aunque no es estrictamente necesario, recomiendo jugar antes la primera parte. La experiencia de las filias y las fobias que suscitan los "personajes" lo merece con creces, y hará que te sumerjas en esta segunda entrega buscando alcanzar tus objetivos con un tinte casi, "personal".

gud gam
Remek volt.
经典之作。
A very good game, totally worth the price.

10/10，难道还有比Portal更让人爱不释手的游戏吗？
射击游戏里最解密的，解谜游戏里最动作的，跑跳空中开门，一个不差。
剧情也很有意思，比一代更加完善的世界观和紧凑的情节，时而穿插黑色幽默，甚至有些对话看似平淡无奇，其实蕴含了很多黑历史，让人不寒而栗。
“请自愿参加混螳螂基因士兵项目的测试品，现在前往参加如何击杀混螳螂基因士兵项目。”
也是够惨的，一个活人都没留下。
环境渲染很不错，暗色系的地下实验室称托出阴森的气氛。心理恐惧是最好的恐惧，单纯的惊悚显得小儿科。
双人开黑也是乐趣无穷，本来就好玩的玩法加上V社一贯的多人游戏好评，按原价买是绝对不亏的。
当之无愧被评选为十年来最好的游戏。
Проходила эту игру не один раз. Очень интересные, а иногда и бомбезные головоломки, искрометный черный юмор от Глэдос и годная кооперативка не оставят Вас равнодушными.
Love the game, wish for more online modes! (y)

BACK AGAIN WITH THE REWRITTEN REVIEWS!!! In this game, you play as a nuetron star on a quest to place interdimensional wormholes everywhere and get to best robo. Along the way, you meet Sebastion, the most annoying spherical object on the face of the earth, Murder Death Kill la Kill, the almighty ruler of death, death, and tests, and Lemon, the sour, but sweet, guide to your adventures through the abys of heat death.

Würde Portal 2 ohne seine Story funktionieren? Würde ein Hotdog ohne Ketchup schmecken? Beides kann mit Ja beantwortetet werden. Aber beides ist lange nicht so gut ohne es. So, Portal 2 lebt durch seine Story so richtig auf und nimmt den Spieler gefangen, in dem Wahn der Robotik. Das Ende ist dem Spiel würdig in seiner ganzen majestätischen Pracht. Wenn Du also auf eine interessante und lustige Story, auf leichte bis nicht ganz so leichte Gehirnakrobatik stehst, dann zögere nicht und frag deinen Bekanntenkreis, wer Dir Portal 2 geben kann. Denn seien wir doch mal ehrlich - jeder dritte deiner Bekannten hat es bereits durch. Die Story.. nicht das Spiel, denn Portal 2 ist unsterblich - und Du nicht!
Portal 1 is a must buy and Portal 2, too!
Recomendadicimo junto con el primero, incluso se expande más que el primer Portal. Un must have obligatorio. De los mejores juegos de la HISTORIA.

Easily the most sucessfully executed comedy video game ever made.
Oh, it's also a really tightly designed puzzle game that perfectly scales its difficulty as you master each mechanic introduced throughout the course of your adventure.

How good is 'Portal 2'? It has only three speaking roles (two A.I.s, one deceased madman) and yet it manages to weave a deep, personal tale with pathos, humor, and melancholy a-plenty.

It's an understated miracle of a game.

Goofy, dark, and engaging, this sequel adds fun and diverse content that is carefully created to provide a fun experience that builds upon the mechanics and story already established without rehashing the original.

**spoliers**

portal 2 is a great game and I loved its extention on the portal universe, but I'll be fair this game had some down falls, well a lot of downfalls.  Portal 1 was probably one of the best games in history and it came short to its predecessor.  Portal 1 showed that a good game can be short but fun, tell a compeling story, and still deliver on the game play.  Portal 2 is short on almost all of those.  

This game never had padding in the middle section something that its little sibbling did not have.   Most of the game play in old aperture involded the player not solving increasingly complex puzzels but looking for the one place to put your portal, thats about it.  However the sections of the games with the test chambers near the begining and end were nice and introduced new mechanics pretty fluently.  

The story was fairly weak as well.  nothing shocked, untill Winstin took over Glados.  In my oppinion that should have been the climax of the story and where the boss fight took place.  However good games must be long, just look at the recent Final Fantasy games or Xenoblade Chronicals that sold so well. (ok xeno was good but didn't sell well because of the 70 hour story)

Now the Game play was just fine I loved the new mechanics I just wished theyy would have incorperated them together more offten, like in the final boss fight with Winston.  

Overall it was a good game but not portal 1, story was lack luster and the middle part dragged on too long but the I was still fairly challenged by many of the puzzels but I would wait for this game to go on sale, I would buy this for 10 dollars not 20
